profile_summary:
As a results-driven Senior Mobile Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in software design patterns and team collaboration, emphasizing agile methodologies including **Scrum** and **CI/CD** practices. I am proficient in **C#**, **.NET**, and **Xamarin**, enabling me to build high-performance mobile solutions. My background includes enhancing problem-solving capabilities across diverse teams while ensuring robust communication.
In addition to my strong foundation in mobile application development, I leverage modern technologies including **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. I have extensive experience with full-stack development using **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, and **FastAPI**, as well as cloud platforms such as **Azure** and **AWS**. My expertise extends to developing enterprise-grade platforms that incorporate AI/ML capabilities for enhanced decision-making and process automation. I am skilled in implementing microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and maintaining compliance standards including HIPAA, PCI DSS, and SOC 2.
